DOC.brief_summary: Each patient preoperatively treat profylactic intraveneous antibiotic . Postoperatively , one group treat intraveneous antibiotic 5 day . The group receive antibiotic .
DOC.brief_title: Does Make Sense Give Postoperative Antibiotics Patients With Uncomplicated Acute Cholecystitis
DOC.criteria: Uncomplicated acute cholecystitis < 5 day ( confirm echography blood sample ) > 18 year old
